head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDSMITH, NORMA B.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDSMITH, NORMA B.

block.p: GOLDSMITH-Norma B. Beloved wife of Sandy. Devoted mother of Lauren and John Saverino, Bruce and Lorraine, Barry and Flo, Jennifer and Lewis Biblowitz. Cherished grandmother of Danielle, Dylan, Kathleen, Joshua, Alexa, Bryan and Jonah. Dear sister of Sheldon and Lucille Gruber. Services Tuesday, 10:15 AM, ''Sinai Chapels,'' 162-05 Horace Harding Expressway, Fresh Meadows, NY.

GOLDSMITH-Norma B. Beloved wife of Sandy. Devoted mother of Lauren and John Saverino, Bruce and Lorraine, Barry and Flo, Jennifer and Lewis Biblowitz.
